Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"

Hello everyone,
currently I try to get everthings set for archiving but I have difficulties with the scoping and finetuning. I have little experience in programming, which is why I got stuck, and maybe here is the place to solve such problems?I would like to archive social media sites - and encountered the problem with the languages (?lang=pl etc.). There is already something written on https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=3113092


Is there a possibilty to reject the URL by suffix within the DecidingScope? I cannot find the ConstrainHost option in the harvester configuration, and the OnHostDecideRule doesn't have the possibilty which are described in the link above. 


And is it possible to maybe share those configurations for downloads? It would things way easier to just see some working examples.


Best wishes,Johannes
